text: Assosuṃ kho jānapadā bhikkhū bhagavā kira tattheva sāvatthiyaṃ komudiṃ cātumāsiniṃ āgamessatī ti
edit: Assosuṃ kho jānapadā bhikkhū – bhagavā kira tattheva sāvatthiyaṃ komudiṃ cātumāsiniṃ āgamessatī ti

translations.transtext: Monks in the countryside have heard thus, "The Blessed One will wait there in Sāvatthī until the end of rainy season.''
